alert.note: Alert for Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tolland, southwestern Worcester, east central Hampshire and east central Hampden Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hardwick, or 16 miles east of Amherst, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Hail up to penny size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southbridge, Auburn, Oxford, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Ware, Sturbridge, Barre, Warren, North Brookfield, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Brookfield, Hardwick, Holland, East Brookfield, Oakham and New Braintree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
